scripts.postinstall: npm run lint && rm -rf lib && babel --stage 1 ./src --out-dir ./lib && browserify -r ./src/index.js:constructor --outfile ./lib/bundle.js --extension=.jsx && cp -R ./src/assets ./lib/assets
scripts.deploy: npm --prefix ./docs install && npm --prefix ./docs run build && cp circle.ignore.yml ./docs/dist/circle.yml && npm --prefix ./docs run deploy
